allItems.name: Winter Shard
allItems.description: Exchange Winter Shards for past event rewards of your choice during the Christmas Event 2023. This item will disappear after the event.

allItems.name: Lump of Coal
allItems.description: Seems like you have been naughty this year!

allItems.name: Pokedaily Reset
allItems.description: This item will reset the cooldown of your pokedaily!

allItems.name: Shiny Charm
allItems.description:
Reward for finishing the spawnable pokedex.
Doubles the shiny chance for all catches (exception: cherish balls)

allItems.name: Snow Head (Common)
allItems.description:
A snow ball for the head of the snowman.
You can contribute to a snowman by typing !pokeadd <part> <rarity>. 
Check the snowman's progress with !pokesnowman

allItems.name: Cherish Ball
allItems.description: A quite rare Poké Ball that has been crafted in order to commemorate a special occasion of some sort. Increased chance to obtain a shiny Pokémon.

allItems.name: Cipher Ball
allItems.description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that is more effective when attempting to catch Poison- or Psychic-type Pokémon.

allItems.name: Clone Ball
allItems.description: An experimental Ball which generates a second Pokemon from the one you originally catch with this ball

allItems.name: Friend Ball
allItems.description: A nice looking ball which is more effective on Pokémon that share a type with your Buddy-Pokémon.

allItems.name: Great Ball
allItems.description: A good, high-performance Poké Ball that provides a higher success rate for catching Pokémon than a standard Poké Ball.

allItems.name: Great Cherish Ball
allItems.description: A modified Cherish Ball with a better catch rate. Has a higher chance to catch a shiny Pokemon.

allItems.name: Heavy Ball
allItems.description: A Poké Ball that is better than usual at catching very heavy Pokémon.

allItems.name: Level Ball
allItems.description: A special ball that guarantees a Pokemon to have a high enough level to be evolved immediately!

allItems.name: Luxury Ball
allItems.description: A rare ball with a fancy appearance. Massively increases the sell price of a Pokemon caught with it.

allItems.name: Magnet Ball
allItems.description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that is more effective when attempting to catch Steel- or Electric-type Pokémon.

allItems.name: Net Ball
allItems.description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that is more effective when attempting to catch Water- or Bug-type Pokémon.

allItems.name: Phantom Ball
allItems.description: A creepy looking ball. Higher catch rate on Ghost type Pokémon.

allItems.name: Poke Ball
allItems.description: A device for catching wild Pokémon. It's thrown like a ball at a Pokémon, comfortably encapsulating its target.

allItems.name: Premier Ball
allItems.description: A somewhat rare Poké Ball that was made as a commemorative item used to celebrate an event of some sort.

allItems.name: Ultra Ball
allItems.description: An ultra-high-performance Poké Ball that provides a higher success rate for catching Pokémon than a Great Ball.

allItems.name: Ultra Cherish Ball
allItems.description: A modified Cherish Ball with a better catch rate. Has a higher chance to catch a shiny Pokemon.

allItems.name: Battle Coin
allItems.description: Reward for joining a PCG tournament. This token can be spend on various rare items and Pokémon in the battle coin shop or kept as reminiscence.

allItems.name: Empty Disc
allItems.description: An empty disc used to teach your Pokémon a full new move set. Use it with caution.

allItems.name: IV Reset
allItems.description: Completely changes the individual values of a Pokémon.

allItems.name: Mood Mint
allItems.description: Delicious mint, which completly changes the nature of your pokemon.

allItems.name: Rare Candy
allItems.description: Raises the level of the selected Pokémon by five.

allItems.name: Team enhancer
allItems.description: Use this item to increase the amount of teams by 1! You can have up to 20 teams.

allItems.name: TM Metronome
allItems.description: Teaches a normal type Pokémon the move Metronome.  Randomly replaces one of the pokemon's normal moves.

allItems.name: TM Work Up
allItems.description: Teaches a normal type Pokémon the move Work Up. Randomly replaces one of the pokemon's normal moves.

allItems.name: Wonder Pass
allItems.description: A rare pass that permits you to wonder trade again instantly.

allItems.name: Bug Stone
allItems.description: A stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is said that the stone's color determines the Pokémon that will evolve.

allItems.name: Team Ghost Badge
allItems.description: Membership token of Team Ghost during the Halloween Event 2022
